data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Nysius Dallas from Mongolian Plateau (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Orsillidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ge, Xinyu, Li, Junlan (2019): Review of the genus Nysius Dallas from Mongolian Plateau (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Orsillidae). Zootaxa 4560 (1): 171-183, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4560.1.10
